"What is (are) Hydrops, Ectopic calcification, Moth-eaten skeletal dysplasia ?","HEM (hydrops fetalis, ectopic calcifications, ""moth-eaten"" skeletal dysplasia) is a very rare type of lethal skeletal dysplasia.
